narrative:
NO NON-COMPLIANT ITEMS WERE IDENTIFIED SURING THIS INSPECTION. 
Applicant meets all requirements to be licensed as a B - Dealer. The license fee will be mailed by the applicant to:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care 
Eastern Region Office. 
920 Main Campus Drive, Suite 200 
Raleigh , NC 27606 
The following requirements were explained to the applicant:
*License renewal requirements and procedure
*Record-keeping requirements
*The Program of Veterinary Care (PVC)
An exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL THE USDA LICENSE IS ISSUED.
